entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.

text: @JasonSCampbell So arrogant self-righteous @DrPhil, like crackpot @DrOz, is also advocating that government should've let even more Americans die, more than 32,000 people who've already died of #COVID19, rather than instituting #StayHome practices. These people are nuts!
